review_title: Committed to Supporting our Healthcare Heroes!
pros:
Ethical and professional fundraising organization
Committed to work/life balance
Staff safety & development a priority
Excellent reputation and strong relationships
Valued Hospital and community partner
cons:
Office space dated, renovations suggested
Limited parking

job_title: Personal Support Work Psw in London, ON
cons: Under staffed Management is checked out

review_title: Mid-Sized Shop with a Great Mission
pros: Strong history of supporting a much beloved hospital in Hamilton. Professional shop with good best practices and strong leadership. Collegial environment.
cons: Older office space, but great location across the street from the Hospital. Smaller shop so perhaps not as much room for advancement, but still a great employer.
